verses.1: Job a mahmah dik kisa tawntung ahih manin hih mihing thumte in Jobʼ thugente dawn ding ngaihsun nawn lo uh hi.
verses.2: Ahi zongin a thu a za, Ram minam, Buz-te beh, Barakhelʼ tapa Elihu a heh hong suak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Job amah kidiksakin Pasian mawhsak zawsop hi.
verses.3: Jobʼ lawm thumte tungah zong a heh suak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Job a dawnna ding uh thei lo uh ahih manin Pasian a khial tawh hong kibang hi.
verses.4: Elihu ahihleh amaute lak panin a khangno pen ahih manin a dangte a pau kim khit mateng bangmah pau loin a om hi.
verses.5: Ahi zongin hih mihing thumte in Job a dawn theih loh a muh ciangin a hehna thuak zo nawn lo hi.
verses.6: Tua ahih ciangin Buz-te beh Barakhelʼ tapa Elihu in thu gen ding hong kipan a, “Kei a khangno lai hi-in, note a khangham na hih manun, ka ngaihsutna note lakah kong gen ngam kei hi.
verses.7: No a khangham zawte in thu a gen ding kilawm hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
verses.8: Ahi zongin mihingte tungah a hong tung pilna pen Vanglian Pasianʼ kha in a hong piak ahi hi.
verses.9: Khanghamna in mi pilsak lo a, thuman zong theisak tuan lo hi.
verses.10: Tua ahih ciangin tu-in keima thugen dingte nong ngaih ding uh ka deih hi. Keima ngaihsutna hong gensak dih un.
verses.11: “Thu na gengen laitakun lungduai takin kong ngaingai a, na thugen dingte uh na zonzon laitakun ka hong ngak hithiat hi.
verses.12: Limtakin kong ngai a, na cihmawhna uh ka thei hi. Jobʼ thugente a man lohna na gen tel thei kei uh hi.
verses.13: Bang hangin pilna a nei-in kigen thei ding na hi uh hiam? Note in lel na hih manun Pasian in Job dawng ding hi.
verses.14: Job in note tungah thu tampi hong gen a, kei tungah hong gen lo hi. Ahi zongin noteʼ dawn bangin ka dawng ngei kei ding hi.
verses.15: “Job aw, hih mite in nang hong lel uh a, nang hong dawnna ding bangmah thei lo uh hi.
verses.16: Amaute pau loin a om ciangun kei zong pau loin ngak lailai ding ka hi hiam? Amaute in a gen ding uh thei nawn loin om mawk uh hi.
verses.17: Tu petpetin kei zong nang kong dawng dinga, keima ngaihsutnate ka hong pulak ding hi.
verses.18: Thu a gen dingin kha in kei hong sawl a, tu taktak ciangin ka kam ka ki-ip zo nawn het kei hi.
verses.19: Thugen theih nading hun a nei lo hi leng, leenggahzu thak a kithun leenggahzu um bangin ka puak kham ding hi.
verses.20: Ka thuak zo nawn kei a, ka gen khia ta ding hi.
verses.21: Hih ka thugenna ah kuamah ka pawlpih kei dinga, kuamah phattuam ka nei kei ding hi.
verses.22: Kuamah ka mawk phat thei kei hi. Tua ci mawk phat leng Pasian in kei hong su mang pak ding hi.
